system.requirements:
Tier 2; WS 45, Agility 40, Unarmed Warrior
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence, Khorne
system.effect:
Character counts as having the Deadly Natural Weapons Trait applied to their unarmed capabilities.
Deadly Natural Weapons: Natural weapons no longer have Primitive(7), doing a flat 1d10+Strength Bonus Damage.
